snippet: Henry Alford’s new book is a whimsical game of tiddlywinks played on the minefield of good manners.
abstract: Charles Isherwood reviews book Would It Kill You to Stop Doing That?: A Modern Guide to Manners by Henry Alford.
lead_paragraph: Henry Alford’s new book is a whimsical game of tiddlywinks played on the minefield of good manners.

headline.seo: ‘Would It Kill You to Stop Doing That?’ — By Henry Alford — Review
headline.main: How to Avoid Potholes on the Road to Politeness
headline.print_headline: How to Avoid Potholes On the Road to Politeness
